LanguageData.MealSurvivalPackFine.label: fine packaged survival meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPackFine.description: A fine packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPackLavish.label: lavish packaged survival meal
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPackLavish.description: A lavish packaged meal, manufactured for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.
